answers.answer: Hello and welcome!You seem to have lost quite a significant weight over such a small period of time. What diet are you taking? What type of exercises have you been doing? Rapid weight loss can be due to diabetes mellitus, eating disorders,thyrotoxicosis,any infection, chronic diarrhea, cancer  etc.All these conditions will have associated symptoms.Excess weight loss can lead to fatigue, dizziness, weakness etc. You need to seek medical help and determine whether you are taking a proper diet or not. In case of any abnormal symptoms the above mentioned causes need to be ruled out. Do keep us posted.Good luck and regards!

question: I am 12 and in the past week and a half to two weeks, i have lost about 7 to almost 10 pounds. Is this normal? i weigh about 112 or 113 right now.
title: weight loss
